leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 核科学与核聚变计算生态
leaf_cluster.typical_objects: 等离子体场, 粒子分布, 磁约束几何, 诊断信号, 输运方程
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 建模→仿真→诊断/反演→控制/优化→验证→工作流
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 大型仿真器 + 诊断/反演工具 + 控制/优化 + HPC

unit.unit_name: 诊断数据处理与反演（成像/谱/信号）

queries: [WEB] plasma diagnostics data analysis tools github
[WEB] fusion spectroscopy simulation and analysis github
[WEB] Bayesian inference for plasma diagnostics github

tools.name: FIDASIM
tools.one_line_profile: Neutral beam and fast-ion diagnostic modeling suite for fusion plasmas
tools.detailed_description: A code that simulates the signals collected by fast-ion diagnostics in tokamak fusion devices. It models Neutral Beam Injection (NBI) and the resulting fast-ion distribution to predict diagnostic signals.

tools.name: BME-X (Brain MRI Enhancement)
tools.one_line_profile: Foundation model for brain MRI enhancement and downstream tasks
tools.detailed_description: A foundation model designed to enhance magnetic resonance images (MRI) of the brain, supporting downstream tasks such as segmentation, registration, and diagnosis.

tools.name: hiperseis
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance seismologic data and metadata processing system
tools.detailed_description: A system for processing large-scale seismological data and metadata, developed by Geoscience Australia, facilitating high-performance analysis of seismic signals.

tools.name: MuRAT
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-resolution seismic attenuation tomography code
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based code for performing multi-resolution seismic attenuation tomography, allowing for the imaging of subsurface attenuation structures.

tools.name: eqtools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for magnetic equilibria in tokamak plasmas
tools.detailed_description: A Python package developed by PSFC for working with magnetic equilibrium data from tokamak plasmas, supporting data reading, coordinate mapping, and flux surface analysis.

tools.name: Minerva (Land Cover)
tools.one_line_profile: Neural network model fitting and testing for land cover data
tools.detailed_description: A package designed to aid in the fitting and testing of neural network models for land cover data, including pre- and post-processing utilities, compatible with torchgeo datasets.

tools.name: PlasmaPy
tools.one_line_profile: Community-developed Python package for plasma physics
tools.detailed_description: An open-source community-driven Python package for plasma research and education, providing common functionality for plasma parameter calculation, transport analysis, and simulation interfaces.

tools.name: PyAbel
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for Abel and inverse Abel transforms
tools.detailed_description: A Python package dedicated to performing Abel and inverse Abel transforms, which are essential for analyzing projected images of cylindrically or spherically symmetric objects (e.g., in plasma diagnostics, combustion, or photoelectron spectroscopy).

tools.name: tofu
tools.one_line_profile: Tomography for Fusion: Synthetic diagnostics and tomography library
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Python library designed for synthetic diagnostics (creating simulated diagnostic data from plasma models) and tomography (inverting experimental data to reconstruct plasma profiles) in nuclear fusion devices.

tools.name: SeisFlows
tools.one_line_profile: Automated workflow for full waveform inversion and adjoint tomography
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based workflow package for seismic inversion, specifically designed for full waveform inversion (FWI) and adjoint tomography. It handles the interaction between the optimization engine and the numerical solver (like SPECFEM).

tools.name: CHERAB Core
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for modelling plasma radiation emission and diagnostics
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework designed for fusion plasma spectroscopy. It provides tools for modelling the emission and sensing of plasma radiation, supporting various diagnostic configurations and physics models.

tools.name: CHERAB JET
tools.one_line_profile: JET tokamak machine configuration for CHERAB
tools.detailed_description: The machine-specific configuration package for the CHERAB framework, providing geometry and diagnostic setups for the JET (Joint European Torus) tokamak.

tools.name: ChiantiPy
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for the CHIANTI atomic database
tools.detailed_description: A Python package to calculate the radiative properties of astrophysical and laboratory plasmas using the CHIANTI atomic database. It allows for the analysis of spectral lines and continuum emission.

tools.name: pyEQUIB
tools.one_line_profile: Plasma diagnostics and abundance analysis package
tools.detailed_description: A Python port of the IDL 'equib' code, used for plasma diagnostics and abundance analysis in astrophysics and plasma physics. It calculates physical conditions from spectral line intensities.

tools.name: Calcam
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial calibration tools for scientific camera systems
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for spatial calibration of camera systems, specifically designed for fusion diagnostics and engineering. It handles complex geometries and provides tools for mapping 2D images to 3D coordinates.

tools.name: SeisLib
tools.one_line_profile: Seismic imaging library for local to global scales
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for seismic imaging, offering tools for surface wave tomography, receiver functions, and other seismological analysis methods at various scales.

tools.name: Fusion Neutronics Workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Automated workflow for fusion neutronics analysis
tools.detailed_description: A workflow tool that combines open-source packages (like OpenMC, Paramak) to produce automated fusion-specific neutronics simulations and analysis.

tools.name: OMAS
tools.one_line_profile: Ordered Multidimensional Array Structure for Fusion Data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to simplify the interface with the ITER Integrated Modeling and Analysis Suite (IMAS) data structure. It facilitates data storage, manipulation, and transfer for fusion experiments and simulations.

tools.name: TOFU-MAaPO
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for metagenomic short read analysis
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline built with Nextflow for the analysis of metagenomic short reads, including quality control, assembly, and taxonomic classification.

tools.name: Minerva
tools.one_line_profile: Client/server platform for scientific analysis and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A platform developed by Kitware for geospatial and scientific data analysis and visualization. It provides services for managing datasets and running analysis pipelines.

tools.name: Minerva Author
tools.one_line_profile: Configuration and data preparation tool for Minerva Story visualizations
tools.detailed_description: A utility tool designed to create configuration files and process images for Minerva Story, facilitating the visualization of complex tissue images and biomedical data.

tools.name: Minerva Story
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive viewer for complex high-dimensional tissue images
tools.detailed_description: A specialized image viewer designed to enable non-expert users to interact with and explore complex, high-dimensional tissue images (e.g., CyCIF, CODEX) with narrative guidance.

tools.name: MinervaChem
tools.one_line_profile: Cheminformatics and machine learning library from LANL
tools.detailed_description: A Python library developed by Los Alamos National Laboratory for cheminformatics tasks and machine learning applications in chemistry, supporting molecular data processing and analysis.

tools.name: SimNDT
tools.one_line_profile: Ultrasonic Non-Destructive Testing Simulator
tools.detailed_description: A simulation tool for ultrasonic Non-Destructive Testing (NDT) based on the Elastodynamic Finite Integration Technique (EFIT), used for modeling wave propagation in materials.

tools.name: JDSurfG
tools.one_line_profile: Joint Inversion of Direct Surface Wave Tomography and Bouguer Gravity
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran-based tool for the joint inversion of direct surface wave tomography and Bouguer gravity data, used in geophysical exploration and subsurface modeling.

tools.name: RADIS
tools.one_line_profile: Fast line-by-line code for high-resolution infrared molecular spectra
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance Python library for calculating and analyzing high-resolution infrared molecular spectra, widely used in plasma physics, combustion, and planetary science for diagnostics and radiative transfer modeling.

tools.name: Raysect
tools.one_line_profile: Ray-tracing framework for optical and non-optical physics simulations
tools.detailed_description: A ray-tracing framework designed for scientific simulations, particularly in fusion plasma diagnostics (e.g., bolometry, spectroscopy) and optical physics, supporting complex 3D geometries and spectral radiance calculations.

tools.name: FWI-USCT
tools.one_line_profile: Full Waveform Inversion for Ultrasound Computed Tomography
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Full Waveform Inversion (FWI) for Transmission Ultrasound Computed Tomography (USCT) using the Angular Spectrum Method, designed for medical imaging reconstruction.

tools.name: WI-UST
tools.one_line_profile: Frequency-Domain Waveform Inversion for Ultrasound Tomography
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based tool for Frequency-Domain Waveform Inversion in Ultrasound Tomography (UST) using ring-array transducers, applicable to medical imaging and non-destructive testing.

tools.name: Tofu (Biobank)
tools.one_line_profile: Synthetic data generator for UK Biobank datasets
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed to generate synthetic data that mimics the structure and statistical properties of the UK Biobank dataset, facilitating research and software development without compromising privacy.

tools.name: Minerva (takuseno)
tools.one_line_profile: Out-of-the-box GUI tool for offline deep reinforcement learning
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface tool designed for offline deep reinforcement learning (d3rlpy), facilitating the training, evaluation, and visualization of RL agents without extensive coding.

tools.name: ufo-kit/tofu
tools.one_line_profile: Helper scripts for tomographic reconstruction workflows
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and tools to facilitate tomographic reconstruction tasks, designed to work with the UFO (Ultra-fast X-ray imaging) framework.

tools.name: 2DNoise_Adjoint_tomography
tools.one_line_profile: 2D ambient noise adjoint tomography and joint inversion code
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran-based package for performing 2D ambient noise adjoint tomography and joint inversion of ambient noise and teleseismic body-waves, used in geophysical subsurface imaging.

tools.name: VIP (Variational Inversion Package)
tools.one_line_profile: Variational Full-waveform Inversion and Tomography package
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for variational full-waveform inversion and tomography, enabling high-resolution geophysical subsurface modeling and imaging.
